LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerClawCombatModule.label: power claw module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerClawCombatModule.descripti: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular model is equipped with a set of plasteel claws that can be fully retracted outside of combat, allowing the wielder to carry it around comfortably with no interference during daily tasks.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerBladeCombatModule.label: power blade module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerBladeCombatModule.descript: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular model is equipped with a retractable, flexible and razor-sharp mantis-like blade. Can be adjusted to fit a variety of fighting styles.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerSawCombatModule.label: power saw module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerPowerSawCombatModule.descriptio: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm or leg replacement. This particular model’s retractable parts allow the whole limb to become a deadly chainsaw-like weapon.
